text: Ma uusan amrin Allaah (yeelashada) Baxiirah (xoolo caanahooda sanamyada loo bixiyo) ama Saaâ€™ ibah (xoolo sanamyada dartood loo sii daayo) ama Wasiilah (xoolo sanamyada lagu sadaqeysto) ama Xaam (riti sanamyada loo daayo) laakiinse gaaladu waxay ka been sheegaan Allaah, badankooduna ma laha garasho
